description: Single storey side/rear extension to the upper ground floor and associated roof alterations.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and documents: 007 REV C Existing sections, 008 REV C Proposed lower ground and upper ground floor plans, 009 REV C Proposed first and second floor plans, 010 REV C Proposed loft and roof plans, 011 REV C Proposed front and northeast elevations, 014 REV C Proposed section CC, 013 REV C Proposed sections, 012 REV C Proposed rear and southwest elevations, 002 REV C Existing lower ground and upper ground floor plans, 003 REV C Existing first and second floor plans, 001 REV C Site Plan, 005 REV C Existing front and northeast elevations, 004 REV C Existing loft and roof plans, 006 REV C Existing rear and southwest elevations.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
